definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: My aunt made me a big doll out of towels.
sentences.chinese: 我的姑媽用毛巾給我做了一個大布娃娃。

sentences.english: They lifted me up and threw me out like a rag doll.
sentences.chinese: 他們將我舉起，把我像布娃娃般扔出來。

sentences.english: Fixed projectiles interfering with Ragdoll physics when killed.
sentences.chinese: 固定彈干擾的布娃娃物理時死亡。

sentences.english: She would cling to the doll until she felt satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 她會緊依布娃娃，直到感到滿足。

sentences.english: Her sister came back from school, and we also had the cloth doll plays a game of the game every household.
sentences.chinese: 姐姐放學回來了，我們又和布娃娃玩起了過家家遊戲。

sentences.english: Rag dolls with button eyes could fairly readily be made from old stockings.
sentences.chinese: 用舊長襪很容易就能做出帶鈕釦眼睛的碎布娃娃。

sentences.english: Tucking the doll under her left arm and gathering the shawl with the same hand, she stood waiting patiently.
sentences.chinese: 她左手夾着布娃娃，並拿着披肩，站着耐心地等候。

sentences.english: Lucy childhood often use broken-down clothes do Rag Doll.
sentences.chinese: 露茜小時候常利用破舊的衣服做布娃娃。

sentences.english: He had lost his hat, and his one wished to throw balls at rag dolls.
sentences.chinese: 他失去了他的帽子，他一想扔球破布娃娃。

sentences.english: It seemed there was no other ways except buy it for me.
sentences.chinese: 沒辦法媽媽咬咬牙，還是買了那個布娃娃。

definition: toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
